title: Merdeka Ataoe Mati
content:
I've just put up my site online recently. Any comments and critics about the navigation system or the user interface design are welcome. Cheers..!

[http://www.merdekaataoemati.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100129024125/http:/www.merdekaataoemati.com/)
author: mk2

comments.content:
Hi Jimmy. I had to read a lot of text before I found your menu, and when I tried to find your work I spent another minute figuring out the gallery navigation and the logic behind the sorting. I clicked the full screen button a couple of times as well trying to find my way. Additionally the mute button didn't react at first. By then, 95% of your readers would have left.  
And that's only the navigation.

Wow, I thought I'd only scare 65% visitors. :D

What do you think if I only left the first introductory paragraph at the frontpage and left visitors' mouse wander around for the menu?

Thank you very much for your opinion.

I think you need a navigation visitors don't have to search for. It should be obvious the second they enter the site. If you're sticking with the flash approach, look to the masters at [group94](http://web.archive.org/web/20100129024125/http:/www.group94.com/) for inspiration.

Well, I guess I have to go back to Wordpress again and let the visitors choose a version they prefer. :D

But thanks again for your opinion Frank. I like your simple site.
